title: Goa to Bangalore by Road: Distance, Time and Useful Travel Information

title: Book a Tempo Travellers from Bangalore to Goa - Chiku Cab
content: The travel time by tempo traveller from Bangalore to Goa is roughly 10 hours and 30 minutes, as the distance between the two cities is approximately 590 kilometers. Chiku Cab allows for easy and convenient online booking as well as several payment choices; as a result, you can use it to book a tempo traveller to take you from Bangalore to Goa.
